analysis.description:

	- players[Payout_id].addr.send(Last_Payout) (//workspace/scal-server/scal/toAnalyze/toAnalyze.sol#86)

theRun.Min_multiplier should be constant (//workspace/scal-server/scal/toAnalyze/toAnalyze.sol#6)
theRun.PotFrac should be constant (//workspace/scal-server/scal/toAnalyze/toAnalyze.sol#14)

	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
